summary: A media tracking app where users can log movies, TV shows, and video games they've watched/played, with ratings, reviews, and social sharing features
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Cinematic hero banner with film reel and game controller motifs in warm burgundy and gold tones (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)

existing_features.title: Build a frontend interface to display the user's media list with cards or rows showing title, type, rating, and review excerpt for each entry
Implement a frontend form to add new media entries with fields for title, type selector (movie/TV show/video game), rating input, and review text area
Create a rating bar component that visually displays the rating value for each media entry (e.g., stars, progress bar, or numerical indicator)
Build a sharing interface that allows users to generate and copy a shareable link to their media list
Implement user authentication using Internet Identity to secure media entries and sharing features
Design a cohesive visual theme with warm, cinematic tones (deep burgundy, gold accents, charcoal backgrounds) and elegant typography that evokes entertainment and media consumption

new_feature_requests.summary: Track movies, TV shows, and video games
Review entry field for each title
Create a backend data model to store media entries with fields for title, type (movie, TV show, or video game), rating (numerical score), review text, date added, and user owner
Implement backend methods to create, read, update, and delete media entries for authenticated users
Create a backend sharing system that allows users to generate shareable links or grant access to their media lists for specific friends
